# Set up

## Loading the data

```{r}
# Migraines after treatment -  time series data

library(carData)
data("KosteckiDillon")
#head(KosteckiDillon)

#rename the data
migraine <- KosteckiDillon

library(ggplot2)
library(dplyr)


library(survival)
data(transplant)
head(transplant)

library(AER)
data(ResumeNames)
head(ResumeNames)

nrow(ResumeNames)
```

```{r}
ggplot(transplant, aes(x = event)) + geom_bar()
```

```{r}
plt <- ggplot(data = migraine, aes(x = dos)) + 
  geom_histogram()
plt
```
